Line10.F8D66: Now those knaves gorge on our food while I watch my children waste away. Please, if you can recover any supplies, Iâ€™ll personally see that your coin purse is filled.
Line6.F8D66: Five times. Five times this month those brigands have plundered incoming caravans. I care little for the stolen gold and spices, but those vultures take the food as well!
